info.name: Travis CI Dark - Purple
info.description:
A dark theme for travis with some purple highlights. Mostly the same as Travis default, with white/fff inverted to black/222. With some text changed to purple from gray/black/white.

Contributions are welcomed!
https://github.com/Obsidian-StudiosInc/Travis-CI-Dark-Purple
info.additionalInfo:
This is a very new style, and some hovers and elements have not be addressed yet. Please feel free to report issues for any missing elements.

Pictures are a bit outdated, borders are gray now.
